article.name: What is Mackerel's SLA?
article.title: What is Mackerel's SLA?
article.body:
At the moment, we do not have an SLA or similar commitment defined, but we do have internally established SLOs (non-disclosed) that we consistently strive to maintain at a high level.

For Mackerel, service quality is of the utmost importance and you can rest assured that we are constantly looking for ways in which we can improve.

Check out the link below for a brief history of the obstacles that weâ€™ve run into so far.
